body: My friend can't get on the server...  Whenever he get on he crashes after 2 seconds. Is it a problem with his computer? Or is it for you guys too? Plz fix if needed. TY GUYS <3
body_tagged: My friend can't get on the server...  Whenever he get on he crashes after 2 seconds. Is it a problem with his computer? Or is it for you guys too? Plz fix if needed. TY GUYS <3
title: Crashing

replies.body:
This is not happening with me.
It is most likely a problem with his computer or internet.
replies.body_tagged:
This is not happening with me.
It is most likely a problem with his computer or internet.

replies.body: I don't think that's the problem... His other internet-using applications work.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think that's the problem... His other internet-using applications work.

replies.body: See if he connects to other servers if not then his issue.
replies.body_tagged: See if he connects to other servers if not then his issue.

replies.body:
1.Does his mc client work for other servers?
2.What version is he using?
3.Are his video settings too high?
4.When running minecraft, does it combine with other programs to make max CPU or RAM?
just some starter questions :)
replies.body_tagged:
1.Does his mc client work for other servers?
2.What version is he using?
3.Are his video settings too high?
4.When running minecraft, does it combine with other programs to make max CPU or RAM?
just some starter questions :)

replies.body:
His Minecraft works on other servers.
He uses 1.7.4 I think.
Idk about his video settings
And no it doesn't combine with other programs
replies.body_tagged:
His Minecraft works on other servers.
He uses 1.7.4 I think.

replies.body: Is he using a texture pack ? Does he have a hacked client on ? :o
replies.body_tagged: Is he using a texture pack ? Does he have a hacked client on ? :o

replies.body: the same happens to me too.
replies.body_tagged: the same happens to me too.

replies.body: with me I'll allways get a problem with java on the hub but I've figured away to get around it- click very fast on the other gamodes
replies.body_tagged: with me I'll allways get a problem with java on the hub but I've figured away to get around it- click very fast on the other gamodes

replies.body:
@jord
tell him to change his version to 1.7.9, sometimes, even if the version is compatible with the server, the actual version is still the best.
if it still doesn't work, ask for his vid settings
@kammy
try changing it to 1.7.9, if its not

replies.body:
This is happening to me, too. I can't get on the server, but all the other servers are totally fine. I've ran it on Minecraft 1.7.2 and 1.7.9, but after 30 or so seconds of pinging, the internet symbol is crossed out with 1.7.9 next to it. I logged out, it still didn't work, I logged back in and played and it worked, then I logged back in and out and it didn't work again. Pretty annoying ):

Edit: Now it's working again ._.
replies.body_tagged:

I logged out, it still didn't work, I logged back in and played and it worked, then I logged back in and out and it didn't work again. Pretty annoying ):

Edit: Now it's working again ._.
